title: Karen Bass could be L.A.'s first female mayor. How important is milestone to Angelenos?
dc:creator: Sonja Sharp, Melissa Gomez
description: Rep. Karen Bass could be the first woman elected as Los Angeles mayor. But do voters care? It depends on who is asking.
content:encoded: Rep. Karen Bass could be the first woman elected as Los Angeles mayor. But do voters care? It depends on who is asking.

media:content.media:description: Los Angeles, California-Sept. 26, 2022-Democratic Congresswoman Karen Bass, a candidate for Los Angeles mayor, speaks at a pro-choice event at the Women's March Action Headquarters in Los Angeles on Oct. 3, 2022. Bass encouraged Angelenos to watch their mailboxes for ballots to be delivered this week. She told voters that ``Choice is on the ballot, and Roevember comes early in Los Angeles.'' (Carolyn Cole / Los Angeles Times)
